name: PAT_MYC_ACSS_TRK
description: This table keeps an audit trail of changes made to the status of a web based chart system account.

columns.name: PAT_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the patient record. This ID may be encrypted if you have elected to use enterprise reportingï¿½s security utility.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number used to identify each row of access data associated with an individual patient record.

columns.name: MYC_ACSS_USER_ID
columns.description: This column stores the unique identifier for the user record who performed some action regarding the patient's web based chart system account.

columns.name: MYC_ACSS_USER_ID_NAME
columns.description: The name of the user record. This name may be hidden.

columns.name: MYC_ACSS_ACTION_C_NAME
columns.description: The category value corresponding to the action that was performed on the patient's web based chart system account.

columns.name: ACSS_TIMESTAMP
columns.description: This is a timestamp indicating when the patient's web based chart system account was changed.

columns.name: ACSS_PROXY_CMT
columns.description: The comment, if one was entered, when an account was activated for proxy use.

columns.name: MYC_ACSS_CODE
columns.description: This stores the access code that was generated for an activation action performed on the patient's web based chart system account.
